title: Whoa whoa whoa! Permabanned?
body: Look I know toxicity is bad in this game, but I'm human like anyone else. I've strive'd to change my attitude because I used to get chat restrictions, I have one bad game and I get permabanned??? I mean these guys were assholes in the pregame, and I got triggered and wanted to ruin their game. I was wrong, I admit it. But permabanned? Please reconsider! I've supported this game for a long time out of my own pocket, I know that doesn't give me any right to be toxic, but cmon! I don't purposely try and ruin this game for others! I had a bad day, got triggered by some assholes, and acted out. I understand getting a ban for it, but PERMABAN?

Paste the entire response here.

Only hearing your side of the story, especially when you're the one punished in this scenario, doesn't mean anything.

I had issues in the past, anger issues mostly. I had like 200 chat restrictions and got through them all and I feel I reformed pretty good. Then I took a long break and just recently (December) started playing again. Also, somehow my account was compromsied and had ppl playing on it for who knows how long but I don't think that has anything to do with my permaban. Today I was toxic in a game, and by toxic I mean I got triggered by asshole teammates and just decided to feed and make them lose. I know, dumb idea. Then I log back in later to see I got permabanned for it? And they give you your chatlogs, with no context it doesnt show none of the asshole things they say to me, and yes I reported them too.

I don't intentionally ruin games, I don't like it when it happens to me either. But when I'm being trolled and people are trying to piss me off? I got triggered and had a bad game. Now I'm permabanned after working so hard to reform, and support refuses to give me any sort of possibility to reinstate my account. I think that is complete bull and a slap in the face to a loyal player who has supported the game financially for as long as I've played.

What choice do I have but to accept it? I just hope those assholes got the same punishment, but I highly doubt it.

This system of yours Riot, it does nothing to curb trolls. Trolls do not care if they get banned. You're only hurting loyal players, who might have behavioral issues that can reform. I've honestly tried. I've had support replies saying that I've been improving. I am willing to accept a punishment, I just feel that a permaban for someone who isn't a troll whos only joy in the game is ruining others good time is extremely harsh and unfair. You're hurting players who actually want to play and not be toxic.

Sounds like you might have been gone when the punishment system changed if your last punishment was a 200 game chat restriction.

Long gone are the days of infinitely stacking chat restrictions. There's now a four tier system:

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day ban
* Permaban

Anything that can get you a 10 game chat restriction can get you permabanned if you keep it up long enough. You can also skip tiers of your behavior is bad enough. If people playing on your account used up your 10 game chat restriction, your 25 game chat restriction, and your 14 day ban, then yeah, you'd be up for a permaban. 

It's possible to go down tiers, but it takes about three months of regular play without incident to go down a tier.

If your account was really compromised you could try to put in a Support Ticket. They might be able to verify that, but then again it might look like account selling or sharing (which would get your account permabanned anyway).

PS: either use the Quote or Reply feature (in discussion mode) if you want people to get notifications when you reply to them.

The punishment system usually has 4 tiers:

1. 10 game chat restriction
2. 25 game chat restriction
3. 14 day temporary suspension
4. permanent suspension

In the case of extreme toxicity, hate speech, threats, etc. it is possible to skip tiers and be escalated directly to a permanent suspension.
So you inted? Yea thats perma worthy.
If you can post the logs of your reform card, we can give you a little more insight as to what might've happened.  It might be a case of something that needs to be addressed with Player Support.

The restrictions were from seasons ago, I gave up League for a long time and recently came back. I have one bad game, and I get perma banned? Literally one. I haven't had any sort of punishments since I came back. I get reported 1v9 and suddenly permabanned?

Logs or gtfo.

If you continued to do whatever you did after multiple restrictions, you deserved it.
Please post the chat logs if you'd like the boards to give you more context.
